param

Class JasFunctionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • param.FunctionFactory
      • param.JasFunctionFactory

  • final class JasFunctionFactory
extends FunctionFactory
    Function factory class for use with JasFunction.
    Author:
    Ernst Moritz Hahn (University of Oxford)
    See Also:
    FunctionFactory, JasFunction

      • getJasPolyRing

        edu.jas.poly.GenPolynomialRing<edu.jas.arith.BigInteger> getJasPolyRing()
        Get JAS ring for polynomials used by this factory. In JAS, rational functions are built on polynomial rings, and this function returns this corresponding ring.
        Returns:
        JAS ring for polynomials used by this factory
